case.state: Tada! Here comes The Magical Girl of Love to save you all!
The more villains the merrier!... Wait, that's not how it works...
So many strange and new people are wandering into here! Hello!
Are we starting soon? Were you all waiting on ~target~? Come ooooon, I'm getting bored standing here!
Huh? They're not going to face me?... Hehe, I don't blame them.
Hey, don't run! I promise I won't slay you that hard!
Not again! I'll never face down a villain at this rate!
A... Butterfly? Well, stranger monsters have existed...
...Huh? Sofia, was it? Did I hear you right, because it almost sounded like you were excited to lose... Or maybe win? I can't tell...
...Wait, what did you say, Sofia? The words were pristine, but the intent was... Odd? Maybe a little jumbled? Huh?
Yes! Barely a foot in the door and I've begun facing a monster already! Prepare for your demise, weird gooey tentacle thing!
Ha! Even here, evil of all shapes and sizes come to attempt and fail at repressing my righteous fervor! I've not met you before, "Zoe", but be ready for your demise nonetheless!
So many ghosts around! I'll have to go back there after this game is done and take care of them.
Gasp! The walls are covered in hearts! I love this place already!
Hmm... When was the last time I saw the sky?... Eh, who cares? So long as there's evil, it doesn't matter if I'm inside or out.
Oh? I can sense someone with an absolutely vile heart amidst us... I can't wait to confront them!
Aha! I knew this place would harbor harbingers of evil! Prepare for your destruction, villain!
The wicked stench of evil permeates this ~background.term~, but all you need fear not! I'll have the villain behind it brought to knee before justice---you have my word as a magical girl!
Aha! So this game is where all the villains have gone into hiding! Well guess what, you can't escape your judgment for any longer---prepare to be crushed!
Oho, an ambush, is it? Well, you cretins ganged up on the wrong hero---prepare to burn in the warmth of love!
I hardly enter the room and evil's already dredging itself up from the shadows to face me. Very well, you wretched husks of sin---prepare for your annihilation!
In the name of love and justice, here I come!
I can handle this on my own!
It's already perfect enough!
This one isn't a hero!
One step from perfection, care to take it for me?
I'll save this trio, but the pair isn't strong enough!
A great pair, please!
Three for the queen!
I need a new and powerful trio!
Even if this card can stand on its own, it shouldn't have to.
Only a smidgen of good. Thankfully I can remedy that!
This hand is evil, take it away!
I can do much better than this, take them all!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for me, please!

state.text: I'll be a lot stronger with ~cards.text~ more ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!

case.state: ~Cards.text~ more magical ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ please!
Face the might of a magical girl!
Do you all know about the worth and beauty of victory?
Call me if anything bad happens, okay? I know I can help!
Has anyone ever actually used magic to manipulate cards? Sounds like a waste of power to me...
Hopefully my hands won't do too well. True triumph comes only after hardship, you know!
Cheating... Bleck! Such a pitiful and pointless form of evil! Done only by helpless scum, as well.
So when do I get to give my victory speech over evil? I'm sure you'll all love it from your spots on the ~background.surface~!
Everything loves me, even cards!
I hope everyone else is having as much fun as I am, people always work harder when they're happy!
Monsters and card games... Both are hardly a threat to this magical girl!
Don't blame me if you lose, it's your misfortune, not mine.
Is there even such a thing as too good?
Await my mercy, if you dare!
What kind of moron would someone have to be to believe perfection doesn't exist?
I'll play and fight till every last one of you lays nude! I've come too far to stop now!
Aha! I knew fate was with me!
Aww, I got a... No, no wait, this is good!... I think? Yes, it has to be!
Who won the last hand? It was me, right?
I never thought this kind of thing could be so... casual. It's really nice.
Hmm... Maybe I'll go searching through some vile alleyways once I'm done with you all.
Retribution is such a sweet facet of justice!
As a magical girl, I draw power directly from my own emotions! That means even without my staff, there's still enough love stuffed in me to kick all of your butts!
None of us magical girls are actually royalty, despite our titles. King acts like she is, though!
I've never really believed all those self proclaimed "super-genius" villains were ever actually that smart... They're dumb enough to sin in my domain, after all.
Ohh, so the suits start with spades, then cloves, then diamonds, and finally hearts! I got it!... Hey wait a second! Why are the hearts in last place?!
So thirsty... Say, does this place have something called a "vending machine"? I wanna challenge its shrimp guards for a Wellcheers; This game is too hot to go without a drink.

Hmph, I still don't like how I can't just blast you all with a spell... Of course, I'm still certain I'm able to defeat you all with any form or method, but good shouldn't be deferred from prosecuting evil!

I wonder where I left that gift I got from the little wee-witch... Eh, why bother searching for it? Whoever finds it gets to enjoy whatever's inside, and I don't have to waste time searching! Everybody wins!

state.text: Maybe if I win this game, Gebura will finally let me into the disciplinary team! Whenever I try to join, she just yells something about "casualties", and how things called "abnormalities" are heartless monsters before dragging me to my room.

case.state: Mm, it's always so boring just standing around in my room! All the agents coming to visit and chat are nice, but still, my purpose can't be denied!
You all have the same boss or something, which is why you coordinated to gang up on me, right? Or does the lot of you just hate good that much?
Putting my fate to chance actually isn't that bad! Thrilling, even!
Normally I'd wave away the uncertainty with a flick of my staff, but that hardly seems fair for the rest of you!
Arcana beats!
Hmm... I wonder what else there is to this place?
One of you could melt down to a goo monster before attacking us all... What? Thinking about that isn't weird, it's a real threat!
Shape up, all of you! You'll get nowhere slouching and babbling like that!

state.text: ...What does this hand mean?... Probably something good, if I had to guess.

case.state: Hmm-mmm-hmm-hmmmm~.
Such a peaceful hand...
And with these cards I can---!... I can... Uh... What was I doing again?
Somebody told me to wear my heart on my sleeve once. This outfit doesn't have any, so I put it on my head instead!
Hmm... Well if I believe these cards are good, then they must be, since good is never wrong! Perfect!
Excuse me, I think someone tried to tear this poor innocent card apart! Could I please have an extra?
I hate uncertainty... How can it even exist when everything always is or goes one way or the other?
Why do the hearts have to be red? Why not pink instead?
This isn't quite the same as a regular fight, but what does that matter? I came here for something new!
Relying on luck... I never knew it could be so exciting!
Modesty's nice, but nudity has its own freedoms.
Without a bodice, my body feels so loose! Like I could stretch and bend within mere moments!
Oh, this isn't quite what I wanted... I guess brute force will have to make up the difference!
Should I be worried...? Nah, heroes never lose!
What to do, what to do... Win? That sounds like a good plan!
I hope everyone at the facility isn't too worried I'm not there to protect them.

Why do people hate spiders so much when all they do is trap and eat irritating and bloodsucking bugs? I'd say spiders are even little insect heroes! If we were going to hate any small creature, I say we should all hate snakes instead!
Evil lurks in the pits of all reality, but only some people or things are willing enough to be consumed by it. When that happens, it's my job to take care of them!
There's this really nice lady back home who has chats with me every day!... At least, she used to... I haven't seen her at all recently, and the agents I ask never give a full answer.
Some villains start stealing, fighting, and causing chaos just because they don't have any money! Crazy, right? Is it really so hard to find a job?
Things seem to be going well; I think this is the longest fight I've ever had in recent memory without someone getting eviscerated!
Knight never let me experience this kind of game before... I can't imagine why, it seems perfectly safe!
Has anyone here got more than two eyes? Ocular excess is a sure sign of evil!... Plus, it's not like you'd need more than a pair to look at everything happening here.
How many hair clips have I conjured and given away? 5? 10? 20? My memory's hazy, and so many agents stop by it's hard to keep count...
Planning was never really my strong suit...
This game makes little sense, but that won't stop me from winning!
My oldest sister would love this game... She'd also probably know how to play cards.
Failure isn't an option, it's a setback!
A snake's snuck its way into my garden...
Uh... What was I doing here, again?... Oh, right! Cards!
D-did anyone else feel that!? Something chilly just brushed past me!
Hearts are the strongest suit, right?
Should I have let go of my staff so easily?... No, I'm sure someone magical as me can handle this on their own.
The power of cards is so fleeting... One moment you've the best hand ever and the next you're taking something off. Sort of like hubris, actually!
Maybe I should have believed in myself instead...
Well, almost nothing is irredeemable... Except that snake, and that scientist, and that murderer, and that puppy, and that tree, and that---
Lucky I haven't chipped a nail in a while...
is this supposed to scare me? Pfft! I've met clerks more threatening than this hand!
Hey, um... None of you forgot about me, right?
...I can manage this.
Ah! The cards keep slipping from my fingers!
There's a whisper in my ear... It's trying to tell me something.
Oh well, I've averted worse disasters.
Of course the cards turn against me now, at my weakest. Hmph!
Who's fault is this?! I know it's not mine!
Some people like to call me really mean things even while under my protection! Their nicknames hardly make sense, how could you possibly hate someone so heroic!
I hate hate hate thieves! They're all cowardly pests who can't even muster enough courage to be squashed like the vermin they are!

Aha, I just came up with a brilliant plan! If I feign weakness, one of you fools will try, and fail, to get the jump on me! It's flawless, so long as I get all you fooled!... What? Dumbfounded already?
T-there aren't any snakes here, right? I think I saw something moving on the ~background.surface~!
It's all suits and clipboards back home... This is the only chance and place I have to do something like this!

Sometimes after a particularly nasty breakout, the halls of the facility lie peppered with uncountable corpses, mutilated beyond recognition... It always saddens me to see so many innocent lives taken by evil.
Someone told me my sisters are defending the facility as well, but I never get to see them... Apparently they've been feeling sick lately.
Does a bodice make your breasts smaller? It might squeeze a lot, but never enough to actually mold flesh, right?

People always slip into madness so easily... I wish there were some way to brace them to the horrors I face further, but how? My presence may be assuring, but I've no way to impart my boundless conviction...

Aww, don't feel too bad about being alone, Okino! Even by myself, I can still fell the greatest of monsters, and I don't see why you can't be the same! And when the time comes, whomever you love can be assured of your strength!

state.text: It's best to just keep looking forward when it comes to isolation, Okino~. Even if you're stronger with another person, you'll live and fight better together if you know how to survive alone!

case.state: Is the blade only enchanted to be sharper? Seems like a waste of magic, if that's the case. Why not spell it to shoot lasers instead? Or hearts! Hearts that shoot lasers!
Hmm? Is there something on my face, Aqua? You're staring at me rather hard.

Hmm... It's hard to be a fan of music when most songs you hear are made to drive people to death or madness... But sometimes, a thrilling piano score fills the halls which I adore smashing it's accompanying musician to!

Hmm... I'd say if you want someone to move at you, it'd be best to start taunting them at a distance! If they're dumb, they'll end up trying to charge straight into you, where you're free to step to the side, of smack them upside the head!
Pestering people from afar has worked most of the time for me! Proud but undeniable statements, confident glances, and all manner of projectiles assure that your target will come flying towards you!
It must be quite a pain not having any siblings to help out with things... Thankfully I was blessed with three. all of them as opulent and righteous as myself!

No sisters or brothers at all? Ugh, even if my strength and conviction would allow me to finish my work alone, it'd still be such a hassle! It makes me glad I have three wonderful sisters to assist in our duties.
Umm... Agent come by my room every so often to chat and question me. Does that count?
Well that's a silly question, Galatea. Who'd want or have reason to prod at their own virtuous protector? That would be silly!
Huh? What sense does that make; if you were dead, I'd not be here since I'm invincible against anything that seeks to harm me! No, you're very much alive, Eichi.
Pfft, that's impossible, Eichi! If I were dead, that'd mean I'd have to lose, and good never loses to evil!

I have the faintest reason why, but if I think hard enough, I can recall a far and hazy memory of one... She was pink and without limbs, flailing alone in her pond, forever begging for love... I don't think I pitied her much, despite that.

...There was a mermaid, I think, in some faraway memory of mine. She was a limbless, tearful creature, calling and begging for the slightest scrap of love from her pond... Thankfully, few people gave it to her, given her monstrous nature.
The facility I protect doesn't allow pets, and even if they did it'd be far too dangerous for them... I still like to mess about with the bird of punishment any time we cross paths, though!

There's a bird who flits about delivering punishment to those who sin against it I pat and cuddle sometimes... But sadly, the facility I protect doesn't allow pets, even if I were somehow able to find a suitable one in the first place.

Entire new worlds full of people to save, and villains to fight?! If I was offered the trip, I would take it in a heartbeat!... On second thought, though, maybe I should finish purging this world of evil first, ehe.

Fresh realms to liberate from the encroachment of evil?! That would be a dream come true... But I'd still have to cleanse this realm of the wicked beforehand. It'd be wrong to ignore injustices right in front of me!
Oh, I'd definitely survive perfectly fine! It's all the fresh and clueless evildoers in my new home that need to worry.

Ha! An entirely alien environment would hardly phase a courageous hero such as myself! Why, when I woke up at the facility I currently reside in, even the hordes of bloodthirsty monsters were barely a threat!

I've already told you before that I'm "The Queen of Hearts", Shamiko! Though, every rarely I come across or overhear someone call me The Queen of Hatred, of all things! It baffles me how they even managed to come up with that!

Well, if you've been listening since the start of the game, it should be obvious I'm known as "The Queen of Hearts" to most!... That isn't including the people who think "hatred" of all words is a good substitute for the end of it.
Queen?! But that's my name!... Well, I usually go by Queenie, but you still can't use it!
Queenie?! But that's my name! You can't have it; what if you do something bad and spoil my image!

Are you a knight, Knight? My older sister Knight is!... Hm, actually I might need to come up with a way to tell everyone which Knight I'm talking about before it gets confusing... Feh, I'm sure everyone'll just remember which of you is which!
King? Pfft, as if! Where's all your gold and jewels?
Servant!? Is that you?! You got so tall, and big, and you don't have your---!... Oh, wait, you're not her. Aww...
I am The Queen of Hearts, defender of love and enforcer of justice! But, for while I thrash the lot of you, you may call me Queenie!
My name is The Queen of Hearts, defender of love and enforcer of justice! For this game however, you may call me Queenie!

condition.saying: I-is this a game, or a trial? You keep talking about justice like we did something wrong.

case.state: Of course you did something wrong! By playing you're opposing me, the true avatar of justice, aren't you?

condition.saying: I-I don't think I like hearing an Earth girl go on and on about justice and evil the minute I meet her. Are you trying to decide who's "good" or not?

case.state: Well Jura, I don't really need to try to decide... After all, you must be evil if you're opposing me, the true avatar of justice!

condition.saying: There's no good or evil here, sister. The only justice is the Holy Ass.

case.state: Hmph! As if a loudmouthed villain like you'd know anything about the presence of good and evil! And if that's your source of justice, you're probably just another dumb cultist come to ruin everyone's day!

condition.saying: You sound like every two-bit Templar who says they're gonna purge Roanapur of sin. It's always a week tops before they end up in a meat cooler. Just chill out and jill off.

case.state: Hmph! I can assure you I'm much better at beating evil than a band of zealots! Besides, what would a filthy villain know about the power of good, anyway? How hard it hurts when a bolt of magic sears part of your face?

Hey! My views aren't naive, they're right! There's good and there's evil, so if something's not one, it has to be the other. And hearing how disposed you are to me---the avatar of justice herself---I would be happy to deal with you after this.

Hmph! Of course not, witch. Though every villain is evil, sometimes a few decide they want to eat children instead of puppies. The difference matters little, though, since all evil is a threat to good, and must be vanquished!
Hey! I'm the perfect example of justice! And I'll have you know I lost my fingers by---!... Uh... I can't really remember how, but I'm sure it was for a good cause! Love takes sacrifice, you know!

Card magic? Hehe, as if that'd work against a villain! I'm pretty sure most of them don't even know how to read, much less play... My sister King might be able to shove one into a chair long enough for a round, though.

Hey! What do you think you mean, saying I'm, "not human"! I'm just a little extra magical than a regular person! And you're right, Aaravi, I'm not some kind of monster freak; I'm a magical girl, and it'd do you well to remember that!
Why thank you, Nagatoro! It takes a lot of work keeping my hands clean when I'm fighting filth all the time! Your nails look great too, even when your hands do that strange wiggle thing.
Image? Nope, I'm just this lovely! Besides, why would I ever need to lie about who I am?

Princess Heart? Umm... Nooo? I can't say I have, and I'm probably the only magical girl with power over hearts in existence... Maybe I'm Princess Heart, and someone just got my name wrong? That's probably it!

Oh, all kinds of creepy evils crawl under my shoes to be crushed! Recently, a weird little clown popped up in front of my room and started trying to pry it open! The agents beat it off before I could unlock the door, but I still helped!

Well duh, why else would it be part of my job?... Er, well, I am actually here partially to learn more about this specific kind of love, but I can assure you I've already got most of it mastered just by watching!
Well, I heard about a card game of love that would also be full of new villains to fight! How couldn't I come, love and justice are my duties, after all!

Other pieces? What about my outfit? All of it's positively dripping with magic! Oh! I'm not sure if this counts, but I can also shoot stars out of my fingertips! Just point, aim, and BANG! Another villain down~!

Of course, ~marinette~, men and women alike ran after me all the time in my old kingdom! Knight would always shoo them off if they had gifts, though... At least she let me meet with the ones who charged after me screaming with knives.
How was I chosen, Senko? I'm... not quite sure; I've had my powers for as long as I can remember. But it definitely involved how heroic, courageous, loving, just, and humble I am!
Romance? What's romance? No, I'm here for love, Senko!
Nope, and I'm sure if your innocence was a lie I'd see right through it! Why do you ask, Senko? Is it because of your more... animal parts?

Oh, I can cast a manner of incredible spells, Aqua! Stars that burn away corruption, spells that soothe all injury... But my favorite is Arcana Slave! Ahh... I just love watching it's beam cleave through evil!
Oh, I can use all kinds of different magics, Aqua, from healing spells to giant lasers!... Ehe, the lasers are my favorite, though. I call the biggest one Arcana Slave!

Well, isn't that obvious? I enact judgment and punishment on any evil who dares threaten the innocent! The threats come mostly from ghastly monsters, and exceptionally wicked people, but I've probably faced down a demon before!

Demons? They're really evil, so almost definitely I've beaten some before! And to answer your first question, Aqua, I simply defend the innocent and helpless by prosecuting villainy! It's fairly simple.

Huh? Oh, right, my fingers! I don't really know what happened to my last one, if I even had it in the first place... But I definitely lost it for a super heroic and selfless reason! There's no other plausible answer, after all!

I'm not really sure, Aqua; I can't remember if I ever even had five fingers... But it doesn't really matter, so long as I'm able to enact my work! In fact, if I did lose my finger, I probably lost it doing something super heroic!

Sort of, Aqua, The Queen of Hearts is just my magical girl title! I'm also known as The Magical Girl of Love, the True Avatar of Justice, O-01-04 in the facility for some reason... But my real name is Queen, or Queenie for short!

Of course I do! I have the power to cleanse the wickedness from all the hearts of the world, leaving them full of naught but love! Usually I have to whack or beam whoever I want to purify a few times, but peace requires action!

What do you mean? Obviously my heart is full of whatever this light is, I'm a hero after all! You're definitely seeing it wrong... Maybe there's still some monster blood stuck on me that's throwing your weird magic senses off...
Country? What's a country? Do you mean a kingdom? Because I'm in charge of protecting one of those!

Oh! Right before I'm about to cast a spell? Ok, umm... {small}Off the top of my head...{!reset} Love needs passion! The will to protect! And finally affection! I'll tell you all about it in a bit, one second!
...What's that supposed to mean, Aloy? Are you doubting my heroism?
Too cheerful!? What's that supposed to mean, Aloy?

Of course, Kyouko! It's quite simple, actually. So, in the world there's good, and evil. Evil will always try to destroy and corrupt all good, so it's up to heroes of virtue like me to purify and defeat every last villain in the name of justice!

I think so, Petra? My staff has been with me for as long as I can remember, though I can't recall how I got it... My sisters are my only family as well, and I'm pretty sure none of them know where their weapons came from either.
...Probably, Petra? I can't really remember where I got my staff from, and I'm pretty sure my sisters didn't give it to me... Still, it must've come from somewhere.
Out of fashion? What kind of a belief is that? If magical girls don't face down evil, who else could possibly go to defeat it?
What do you think you mean, magical girls are out of fashion? Last I checked, evil is still timeless, and who else but the blessed are virtuous enough to face them? Civilians? As if!
Rule a kingdom? Oh no, I'm far too busy hunting the wicked for that. Besides, what better way to lead a nation to glory than to rid it of all who threaten it's prosperity yourself?

Ruling? I might've done that at one point, but even if I did I much prefer hunting evil down with my own two hands than ordering someone else to do so from a throne! How else can I be sure any opposition to peace is dealt with properly?

Hm? Well, is there even any question that I'm gifted? My magic is par to none, granted to me by the grace of love and the firm hand of justice! Of course you'd detect how incredible my abilities are, Mia!
Is my power and prowess even a question? Of course the one blessed by the grace of love and justice would have more than enough magic pouring from them for you to detect, Mia!
Did I? I probably did, actually! Besides myself, I have three sisters who also help fight the forces of evil alongside me! Why do you ask? Are you seeking to meet more heroes?
I would love to talk about my sisters! All three of them are so wonderful, and we're all heroes! I've lost count of how many lives we've saved with one another...

The facility is... odd? But in a good way! It's endless hallways holding rooms, most containing horrifying abnormalities! I woke up in a room there one day, but when I learned how many abominations resided near, I didn't mind much.

The facility is certainly a strange place, but I like it! There are so many hallways and rooms, all holding countless abnormalities to face... Even when I woke up there without a recollection of my arrival, I was thrilled to see I had work to do!
Oh, of course! I love my sisters, myself, everyone I protect, other heroes like me, those agents that dress like me, the agents that don't dress like me. the-
Of course! I love all the people I protect, I love my beloved sisters, I love myself, I love love, I love justice, I love my charges, I love justice, I-

Oooh, I'd love to hear about it, Mia! But, if you're so inquisitive about the avatar of love and justice herself, it'd be against my duty not to detail my crusades and messages of peace! Now, what would you like to know?

Learning about a new kind of magic sounds fun, Mia! But, if you want to learn more about such a powerful and striking figure such as myself, then I'll spin the tales of my abilities and crusades best I can! What would you like to know?
Still my cards keep faltering?! What... what curse has one of you villains placed upon me?! I demand to know!
Tremble before my righteous power, and prepare to lo---!... Eh!? I lost already?
What a feeble assault! And you all dare call yourselves villains?
Pathetic! I've fought puppies fiercer than all you combined! They smelled better, too!
Isn't it supposed to be easier for evil to fight an unarmed opponent? I guess you're all just that incompetent.
Hmm? Oh, it's my turn? I wasn't sure you'd all ever win against me once more.
Hmm... Well. I suppose I'm doing well enough to spare you all some of my decency...
I'm still winning; remember that whenever any of you feels like gloating!
I've played around long enough. Time to finish this!
I guess a bit more risk couldn't hurt...
Really? I have to step this close to forfeiting? Fine, if it means I get to finish this!
I'll not be afraid to sacrifice everything for the sake of justice!
Well, it wouldn't be very heroic of me to crush you all without a fighting chance!
Finally! I was afraid you'd all be gone before I started!
Took you all long enough, I'm not even armed!
I'm not exactly thrilled by that early showing, but the fight is still young!
How cute! I think you all actually tried that time!
Hmm? I have to strip again? Finally! Took you weaklings long enough!
Oh? Is someone finally taking a stand?
Really? It took you all this long?
You must all be desperate, ganging up on me! Very well then!
We've all waited long enough for this. Why even hesitate?
I'm not to be outdone! Stand aside and watch me!
Oho? Finally decided to stand against me?
Is that all you've got? I hope not, it's hardly worth my time to fight every single one of the little evils.
What's small, relatively useless, and can be easily removed?... Well, there's the whole wicked lot of you, or my shoes!
You know, I could just keep summoning new staves over and over again... But unlike all of you, I'm not one for cheap tricks.
...It's not fun when I keep losing. That's what the rest of you are here for.
...Why did I let go of my staff, again?... Wait, did I let go of it? Or did someone steal it from me while I wasn't looking? I can't remember...
"Well played!" That's what I would say if you creeps had any semblance of decency or honor.
Against evil, heroes can struggle, but never lose. Of course, this means I'm destined to claim victory, but it doesn't mean I can't still be upset with all of you!
...Fine. But this won't stop me any more than all my other strips!
Hmph! I know you're all mocking me, but that's not going to dissuade this magical girl from victory!
Everyone's layers are all nice and balanced... Wonderful!
With the magic in my soul and the love in my heart, I shall never falter!
I'm not losing, I'm just postponing victory!
Maybe my bodice next? No, I don't believe any of you have earned it quite yet.
How humble of me, giving you all a fighting chance!
Why wouldn't anyone be excited about stripping! It's so much fun!
Attention is nothing new to me, but it's never been quite so... Charged?
Ohh noooo, I'm "beaten". Whatever shall I do? I know!
I'm magical and amazing. What hope do you all have to compare?
No time for shock. I need to get straight to it! This outfit is complex, you know!
Pah, hardly a scratch! An early loss means nothing to justice!
What a cheap blow, outnumbering and ambushing me... No matter, I've triumphed over sneakier scum! And I'll be sure to pay this assault back a thousandfold!
That's two blows now, and I've hardly torn through everyone's layers... Must just be bad luck. Or, all the villains here decided beforehand to cheat! Yes, that's it!
...Cheaters.
You all got lucky... Pray that fortune lasts.
I'd not put it past a group of villains to cheat at something so trivial. Evil encompasses all sin, after all.
T-this is nothing! All of you vile sinners are nothing!
N-no fair! Where's my second wind?!
W-what went wrong? Were there too many of them? Maybe I should have asked King to come with me...
I-I'll get you all for this...
Are you trying to scare me off with an early blow? Ha! Justice never backs down!
Stripping so early won't scare me! Just watch!
Should I be bothered by my position?... Nah, it'll work out fine! It always does.
Bit of a tough spot... Good thing I'm tougher!
This game won't shape up well if I keep at it like this... Eh, that just means I get an even better chance to show off why I'm the best magical girl!
Good will always pull through in the end, no need to worry!
Eh? Since when did I have so little left?
I wasn't expecting to fall out of favor so harshly! Do all of you hate me for some reason?
Don't get a big head over this! After all, everyone here aside from me simply exists only to be beaten!
Guess it's up to me to be the brave one. It always is.
No one wants to be the brave one? Fine, I'll do it then! But you all better follow suit!

condition.saying: Oh, I figured it'd be like...

case.state: Why, it's because I'm the supreme defender of love, and the people who indulge in it! "Queen" is my name, so "Queen" plus love makes The Queen of Hearts! In fact, I'm here to learn more about this kind of love since it's my duty to defend all it's forms!

condition.saying: Okay, so your magic isn't themed, but your names are?

case.state: Oh, I'm here to learn about this new kind of love! It's my job as the Queen of Hearts to defend and uphold all kinds of affection, after all!
Oh... Well, that still isn't very nice. It's my job to defend them, you know. The good ones, I mean. The villainous dregs I don't care for till they repent.
Really? I thought it was just going to try and attack me! Good thing I never take off my outfit... Ehe, excluding now, of course.

Nope, my old home was just a regular, but wonderful, kingdom! My sisters all have titles like mine, though! There's The Knight of Spades, The King of Diamonds, The Servant of clubs... But we all just use the first parts to save time!

Who are you to lecture a hero of justice on right and wrong? I assure you, if all the villains who've fallen before me were good, they wouldn't have even been there! Besides, my magic only burns the wicked, probably unlike yours.

Standing against the avatar of justice herself---me!---Isn't something someone does out of the goodness of their heart. They do it because they want to destroy everything just, Elphaba! No need to hesitate when it's obvious,
Oh? Didn't you catch my introduction? I'm a magical girl! A magical girl of love, specifically!
Yeah! It's so weird, your arms just get all wobbly and move around like snakes!... W-wait, not that! L-like nothing! Like nothing, that's what they move like!

Aww, don't feel too bad, Cheryl! Whenever I meet someone new at the facility they always seem a little spooked, rambling on about how I, "shouldn't be outside of my room!" or why me just going on patrol is, "a safety hazard!"
Gasp! So you wanted to be a magical girl? What was your outfit like? Did you have a catchphrase? And what's this about your "not-love magic"?
I noticed, Cheryl! It's so new, all this teasing and arousal... Still...

Does it really matter if there's a bigger plot? Even if the current evil's a shambling heap of flesh, or a mad magician, what's important is stopping them! Though... That wicked army which terrorized my home prior was pretty organized...
...Psynergy? Element?... Is love an element? Because I'm really good at channeling that to burn away evil, or mend the wounded!
...I've not heard of Psynergy before, And what's an element?... Is love an element? If it is, maybe my proficiency burning up villains with it will help me understand!

To be the avatar of love and justice is to embody and protect righteous ideals, and the people who believe in them! It's actually pretty simple, despite the intensity and importance the title entails!

Being the avatar of justice and love is to stand proud to protect all the good in the world, whether it be people or ideas, from whatever encroaching evil seeks to threaten them! It's fairly straightforward, actually!

We get along amazingly! King knows a ton about making people happy, Knight loves safeguarding everyone, and Servant is genius with law and balance! There's also me but... Hehe, I think my presence is description enough.

Of course! King is our leader, always trying to cheer everyone up, Knight is constantly fussing over us to check if we're safe, Servant is fast to correct and explain anything related to balance and I-... Well, I think what I do for us all is fairly obvious!
Maybe it seems that way because you aren't quite equipped or confident enough to enact the highest order of justice! Here, let me show you what the power of love can do!
Hehe, hesitation is a strong sign that maybe you aren't prepared enough for a duty similar to mine! Watch, let me assure you the protection and efficiency love brings me!

Oh, that's what you mea-? I mean, I knew that's what you meant! I am the champion of love, after all! And... I wouldn't really say so? I'm too busy fighting evil to do much else, and when I'm not battling I'm being visited by agents nonstop!

Oh! Ohhh... I definitely knew that! And... I think I might be too devoted to my duties for a partner... Prosecuting evil is just so much more important, and I just can't spare a single moment for anyone not in need!
A rose uses a magic staff?... Really? They are pretty, but wouldn't a poppy make more sense, with all their sleep spells and curses?

Really? Cool! Though, I don't see the point of transforming zombies into goats of all things. It's not like a shambling cadaver is very threatening--- why not just cut out the middleman and zap them to ash?
Ugh, villains with magic are the wooooorst! At least the zombies don't sound smart enough to cast anything dangerous or fancy!
Mhm! My magic just burns alllll the wickedness in a villain's heart away like a torch to oil! And after, they come out of my judgment with not a scratch on them!
How was I created, Aqua?... Umm... I dunno... As long as I can remember, my sisters and I were kinda always just there.
This "royal guard" of yours mustn't be that good at their job if you get to run around freely... In fact, there's an answer to your question. Taking care of conceited villains like you!

Oh really? Well, I don't think this "royal guard" is a very noble body of enforcement if they let pompous villains like you dally around unopposed! In fact, that's why heroes like me exist to stop you!
You all seem fairly pathetic compared to the villains I'm used to. Because of this, I choose to discard my magical staff of love, so I may savor your futile struggling a little longer!
Hmm, maybe I should have gotten a few swift kicks in before I had to strip... Nah, no need for that when I'm already planning on beating you all up in the game!
How typical of villainy, forcing me to desecrate a symbol of love... If I wasn't used to these antics, I'd be a lot more upset right now!
Thou that are more azure than justice and more crimson than love, lend me thy strength...
Well, on the plus side at least this game isn't pathetically easy... Not like the fights with petty beasts and criminals I stumble across on patrols.
Oop, almost forgot to take off my shoes! Wouldn't want to be impolite!
Normally, my skirt would never separate from my bodice. But with a little force and magic, anything is possible!
I'm sure I won't need my staff here! Nobody seems to be in imminent danger.
Come to me magic, serve in the name of love~!
Aaand now for the strings~!

Shower? Bathroom? I'm far too busy to clean myself off normally! I just use magic to keep myself pristine. Besides, my room doesn't have anything in it besides a bed and some furniture the agents brought me.
Even if I had the time to shower, I don't think water and soap is enough to clean off all the blood and viscera that gets caught on me... No, it's much faster to just wave it away with magic!
Dangerous?! Ha, as if! I'm probably the safest person to ever grace the world! The only things that would ever find me dangerous are villains!... Hey, wait a second...
Hehe, there's no problem with acting powerful when all you have is knowledge! Besides, it's wonderful to hear someone was so passionate about my kind of work to imitate!
...That doesn't mean I'll ever stop my righteous journey of discovery! Love shall prevail in the face of uncertainty!
Really? Water can do all that? And you can control it to do so?... Maybe love is whatever that 'element' thing is...
You can manipulate water to do all that, Mia? Wait, if the "element" of water is that powerful... Maybe love is an "element" too...

My sisters and I, fending off all manner of horrible beasts and people with my magic... That's what my "crusades" are; endless bouts to defeat the swathes of villainy that threaten everything good and just!

I fight and defeat so many different horrors with my sisters with magic every day... That's what those "crusades" are! The countless journeys undertaken by heroes to strike out and save the world from evil!
Oh yes, all of us are very close! Especially since we all spend so much time together fighting evil... Two of them are even in the same facility as me! They don't go out of their rooms much, though.

Mhm! We've all faced so much conflict together, it's hard to imagine we'd ever not fight alongside one another... King and Knight even reside in the facility with me! I don't see them much outside of their rooms, though.

Tada! And you're correct, Mia, that's only a fraction of my righteous prowess! I would have demonstrated a more... efficient spell, but that wouldn't quite be in the spirit of the game, even if it was justified.

Tada! And that's right, Mia, this is only a small demonstration of my irreproachable prowess! Normally, I just cleanse of blast away a nearby object or evil to show off, but apparently that makes people in this place nervous.
Why thank you, Mia! Though, I don't think I've had an eye knocked out of it's socket quite yet, much less had an agent snatch it...
That's very kind of you to say, Mia! None of the agents are very inclined to pick out any kind of viscera from after a battle, though, and the most I've had lost from my face was teeth...

...Well, that's what happens most of the time. If a heart's too dark, parts around it tend to burn up alongside the evil... It's not a big problem, though! After all, with monsters that vile, there's usually nothing worth saving.
Nope! Just love and smiles~.
What manner of delusion is festering inside your soul to enable you to spew such nonsensical drivel? Blech... Well, dumb or not, you'll fall to me all the same. Have at thee!
Royalty more virtuous than heroes? Even the idea is atrocious, that the symbols of goodness could be supplanted by a simple ruler! Why, I should blast the thought clean from your deluded mind...
...And now, through the power vested in me, I shall take your hearts from the blackened tar of evil consuming it!
...And once I'm through beating everyone here into submission, I'll be sure to wash away every last speck of sin corrupting your souls!
...So I may bring the power of love to these forsaken souls, might they be saved!
...So I may bring the hand of justice down upon these wicked evildoers, and repay them their sins in fold!
For all the good and loving people of the world, I swear to play till my last breath! Have at you!
Not one more scratch shall befall me, now I've steeled myself! In the name of love and justice, here I come!
Aaand, they're off! It's a step back from victory, but sacrifices must be made!
Now, onwards! Soon, I shall have all your shoes and more in return for this meager assault!
But still, I can't fall here. Not to such pathetic evils...
And in the natural order, heroes always triumph over evil. There's no reason to get nervous.
...My outfit doesn't have that many parts, doesn't it? I'll have to be more careful!
It's a nightmare keeping my shoes clean, with all the blood and muck I have to trudge through. Floating makes it easier, but when the monster knows how to shoot goop... Blech!
Tada! Wonderful, aren't I?
Ehe! I've never used magic for that before! How was it?
Tada! See, you can hardly tell there was another piece to begin with!
It's not like any injury could ever bother me. In fact, conflict is what makes an encounter interesting! So all of you try your best, ok!
...I feel I could've taken something else off instead of my underwear, but what? I can't think of anything off the top of my head.
Should I have kept my panties..? No, I'm already so close, I might as well have taken them off...
Now, through the power vested in me, I shall have us all partake in the wonders of love!
Hopefully my staff doesn't fly off too far... It has a habit of being stolen by people thinking that a random floating weapon will give them magic powers.
Is that all you've got? Ha! If I weren't trying something new, I'd have already had you cleansed!
Can I beam ~name~ with my magic instead? Pleeeeeease?
Ha! I thought you were trying to make this challenging!
Hardly a hindrance!
At the very least you aren't that hideous on the outside, where it matters the least.

It's a wonder none of you villains have even shuddered or paled with fear at the sight of me come to punish you... Maybe I should try wearing a spooky mask every once in a while, to keep evil on it's toes.
Don't blame me if I keep insulting you! Usually I'd be too busy fighting to say this much, but, well, watching morons like you strip takes a long while. What else am I supposed to do?
Cower in fear, vile ~name~! The hand of justice points to you, righteously seeking retribution!
I better not have staggered this close to oblivion for nothing...
Twilight looms overhead, a starry solace heralding your destruction.
Ohhh, this retribution shall be so sweet...
Ha! Karma finally comes back around to strike this cretin!
Weak baddies like you are no match for me!
That's what you get for fighting a hero!
Your loss is for the best, ~name~! Someone has to keep everything moving!
Hmmm... Yep, it's your loss, ~name~!
No one gets anywhere by giving up! Never stop trying and failing, ~name~!
Let's look past victory and instead right at ~name~! Come on, don't leave us waiting!
Being happy with what you have is only a small part of life. The important piece is getting stronger once you lose it!
Risk changes the whole experience. Now that I've lost a bit, winning just feels so much more exciting!
Luck is such a measly excuse. Now awe, there's a real reason for your loss!
Don't whine, try and lose with dignity!... Oh, right. Stripping. Nevermind.
I wish more villains tried to fight with a card game; less people would get hurt.
Join me, ~name~! Let both of us share this experience with one another!
Haaa... Holding on this close to the end just makes me more excited...
Why don't you balance the playing field this round, ~name~? There's quite a big divide, but I'm sure you could fill it.
Ready to show off? Maybe something big this time?
Well? Are you planning to join me soon?
Please... Something big!
Come on, ~name~! Show us how brave you can be!
I'm a bit... preoccupied, so it's up to you to make some good choices, ~name~. You can do it, I believe in you!
Don't mind me, it's your turn to go, ~name~!
I assumed after once I was done the game would just end... I'm the only hero after all.
Might as well sweep up you stragglers!
Better late than never! That's what an agent told me once before dashing off to catch a train!
I have to admit, you're pretty good at this! Still, skill isn't going to save you from justice!
Is that all you've got? Ha! If I weren't trying something new, I'd have already had you cleansed!
Can I beam ~name~ with my magic instead? Pleeeeeease?
Ha! I thought you were trying to make this challenging!
Hardly a hindrance!
At the very least you aren't that hideous on the outside, where it matters the least.

It's a wonder none of you villains have even shuddered or paled with fear at the sight of me come to punish you... Maybe I should try wearing a spooky mask every once in a while, to keep evil on it's toes.
Don't blame me if I keep insulting you! Usually I'd be too busy fighting to say this much. but, well, watching morons like you strip takes a long while. What else am I supposed to do?
Cower in fear, vile ~name~! The hand of justice points to you, righteously seeking retribution!
I better not have staggered this close to oblivion for nothing...
Twilight looms overhead, a starry solace heralding your destruction.
Ohhh, this retribution shall be so sweet...
Ha! Karma finally comes back around to strike this cretin!
Don't feel bad, ~name~! You lost the moment you went against the power of love!
I shouldn't celebrate too much. A victory means nothing when over an impotent opponent.
A hero to protect you and friendly people all around, what's there to be nervous about?
I'm good. You're facing me, so you must be evil. That's reason enough for you not to complain!
Surrender, ~name~!... No wait, don't surrender! I'm not done!
Strip in the name of love~!
Stay calm, ~name~! With me watching, nothing will dare try and embarrass you!
Isn't this game so much fun? I'm hardly even trying and still loving it!
What's ~name~ planned next? I can hardly wait to see!
Victory comes naturally for heroes such as myself! No foe has any chance ever change that!
You can never give up so long as I don't! If not, then who would we face?
Persistence should be rewarded; both yours, and mine!
Well? Don't choose now to be a coward, ~name~!
In case you somehow haven't figured it out yet, having a bad hand makes you lose.
I doubt you'll be able to match my showing... But it wouldn't hurt to try.
Balance is important, right? So why don't you join me in harmony?
~name~ now? Yes!
You can do it, ~name~! Keep losing!
You already have such a great figure, ~name~... It's beyond imagination how much nicer it would look without clothes to ruffle it.
There's always the next hand, and once it comes you can lose again and again and again, ~name~!
I'm finished... but you still aren't? Huh?
Now I'm a bit more focused, being out of the game feels so dull... At least I was doing something during the forfeit.
I could leave now I'm done, but then I wouldn't get to see what happens to ~name~!
N-no! Balance demands they lose! I demand they lose!
I don't think perfect "balance" is going to help me or anyone else right now.
...Nobody lost? How does that happen?
But they---! The cards were---! Whaa?
Huh... I guess here, vanity does have merit...
...Meh.
They never want to go down easy... That's fine, I never try to bring them down softly either.
Stubborn like a cockroach.
What a dirty trick! Learned from the wicked of your soul, I presume.
Aren't you supposed to be losing?
What cruel trickery is this?! I demand to know!
...It's not too late for me to punch them instead...
Why didn't you take that off sooner? Think of all the shame it could have saved you from!
I'd assumed you forgot about that. Good on you for remembering, I guess.
You saved ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~..? But... Why?
Aww, now you won't be able to--- Huh? What are you reaching for?
Oh! I thought this last round would have finished you off!
I was wondering if you'd ever take that off!
Huh? But why save it till now?
Oh, guess you'll be holding on a bit longer than I thought.
Are you teasing me? It's a decent attempt, I guess...
But why? Why take it off now, or remove it at all?
Nothing to worry about, love takes time!
So pretty! ~clothing.ifPlural(They|It)~ almost ~clothing.ifPlural(seem|seems)~ enchanted!
Sometimes people come into my room absolutely smothered in little trinkets. You remind me of them, ~name~.
Losing an accessory isn't that bad! Look, I've done it too!
...Wait... Didn't you already take off your ~clothing~ earlier? Maybe I remembered it wrong...
You can strip with more passion than that! Come on, flick your wrists! Strike us a pose!
Is my effort worth that little? Barely measuring to ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~?
A hero wondrous as me, being utterly humiliated by the likes of ~name~...
...Fate has a cruel sense of humor.
You---! You---!... Mark my just words, I'll get you for this!
Booo! You could at least try and pretend you're losing!
Oh... I guess it was foolish of me to expect generosity from a villain.
...Are you serious? This is what happens when I'm not able to keep people like ~name~ in check!
Boooooo! Boooooooo!
You still have something small left!?
Oh... only your ~clothing~... Callousness is to be expected from a villain, I guess.
Hurry it up a little! I've got three villains to go through today, and an entire facility to protect!
I hate it when villains do this... Either stand and take your beating, or surrender! Don't drag it out in such a menial way!
It'd have be a lot more interesting if ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ was possessed by a monster or something actually willing to give a proper fight.
Typical of a villain to have so little respect for such an illustrious opponent...
Let's just get going...
This only served to motivate me further! And when finally ~name~ comes under my heel, I'll enjoy it twice---no, three times as much!
You... You've not heard the last of me, scum!
An insult to me is an insult to justice itself! I hope you're prepared for the consequences of such disrespect...
N-no... Noooo!
Lot of good holding onto your ~clothing~ did you.
And it's not even like I'll be seeing anything new. What a pointless strategy!
What else are you hiding from the game, ~name~? Nothing interesting, it seems.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ could have been used to build up a little more tension you know... Oh well, at least it got you another chance.
That choice was... Smart? Dumb? Evil?... I'm hoping for evil!
You're full of surprises, aren't you, ~name~!
I don't mind you kept your ~clothing~... Not like it was hiding anything important.
At least I can look at the rest of you, ~name~.
Well, you were still exposed before that; might as well enjoy what I can already see.
Maybe lose a liiiitle more? Please?
Even if not much changed with ~name~, at least he's still just as naked!
No reason to shy away, let's get going, ~name~!
~Name~ must be pretty powerful! I can hardly wait to see ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ in ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ full!
You still look handsome without your ~clothing~, ~name~! Don't worry!
I'm just getting started with you!
Patience is a virtue, one a righteous hero such as myself will partake in!
What is success without struggle?
Onto the next hand please!
I've bigger fish to fry, ~name~! A hero can't afford to be everywhere dealing with half-evils!
The evil would have usually revealed itself by now.
...My shoulders feel cold.
...Peace is getting tired of this.
Hehehaha!... Now would be a good time for you to give up, you know?!
How selfish of you, leaving me like this without any help!
We're both getting nowhere like this...
What's the point even? You might as well have not stripped at all to at least spare my focus.
I'd be more upset if I hadn't already figured out this game was rigged against me.
Why am I not surprised! Oh, right, it's because you're cruel, ~name~!
Aren't villains supposed to try and show up the hero? Why aren't you?
Huh... I guess here, vanity does have merit...
...Meh.
They never want to go down easy... That's fine, I never try to bring them down softly either.
Stubborn like a cockroach.
What a dirty trick! Learned from the wicked of your soul, I presume.
Aren't you supposed to be losing?
What cruel trickery is this?! I demand to know!
...It's not too late for me to punch them instead...
Oh great. Turns out I'm stuck watching your pitiful struggling for even longer.
Did you really keep your..? You did, didn't you!
You're still going? But how! I thought--- Ohh, your ~clothing~!
Huh? That counts?
Oh! I'd forgotten about your ~clothing~!
You... Saved that..?
...Whu? You had ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ ~clothing~ still?
I almost believed your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ going to stay... Such a shame, they complemented your body nicely.
O-okay? But wouldn't it be nicer to get to the forfeit?
Aww, but can't you just keep your ~clothing~ and finally lose for good?
I hope your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ too important, I'd hate it if something bad were to happen!
Progress is progress! No need to get upset over small stuff!
Could I offer you a hair clip? It would be a vibrant addition alongside your ~clothing~!
Only your ~clothing~? Ok!
So pretty! It's like your own personal sparkle!
Have I seen that kind of accessory before? Maybe King had one in her closet...
Stripping's no fun alone...
What's the point if I'm the only one losing? Isn't this supposed to be intimate?
What did I do wrong? Actually, what did you do wrong?
Wait, that's it?! This is why villains don't deserve mercy!
Did you do that to get back at me for something? Ha! Like I'd do something evil to anyone!
Oh. Booo..
I'd whack you with my staff if it hadn't run off!... Wait a minute... Aha! You sabotaged it, didn't you ~name~! That's why it won't return to me!
You're boring, and infuriating! I didn't even know someone could be the two at once!
Great job to the rest of you. This is what happens when you leave a goon to do a hero's job!
Hurry it up a little! I've got three villains to go through today, and an entire facility to protect!
I hate it when villains do this... Either stand and take your beating, or surrender! Don't drag it out in such a menial way!
It'd have be a lot more interesting if ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ was possessed by a monster or something actually willing to give a proper fight.
You... You've not heard the last of me, scum!
An insult to me is an insult to justice itself! I hope you're prepared for the consequences of such disrespect...
N-no... Noooo!
Typical of a villain to have so little respect for such an illustrious opponent...
Let's just get going...
This only served to motivate me further! And when finally ~name~ comes under my heel, I'll enjoy it twice---no, three times as much!
You could've taken that off while still decent, you know. Was this some manner of perverse plan?
But... Why keep it till now? Why not take it off earlier?
Was their weakness a trick? No, I'm to focused to be deceived! ~name~ must have simply forgotten her ~clothing~ existed, even while wearing it.
All this means is we get to keep seeing the best part...
Hmm, I guess what matters is that plan lets ~name~ keep going!
Nothing changed... That's not so bad!
Not like it covered much anyway...
No more small bits, right ~name~?
How do I know you don't have any more small things saved or hidden away? You could still be wearing!... Umm... Fake nails, maybe? Are you wearing those, ~name~?
Sentiment doesn't help you win a fight.
I'm sure whoever gave you that is very happy you kept it for so long. You know who isn't happy? Me!

state.text: You're trying your best, ~name~, we can all appreciate that!
Don't feel bad about taking off something small ~name~, I know I still like you!

case.state: Good, peaceful, and beautiful. I loved it!
Small things can have much more meaning outside of size, it just takes some strength to unlock it!
I'm sure you're fine, ~name~. It was hardly a scratch.
Strip more next time! Rewards should rise to stakes, right?
What's the point of playing? ~Name~ keeps fleeing from my purpose.
The game's fair, just not in the right way.
I may be the magical girl of love, but it's also a two-person experience! Stop falling behind!
How ungrateful, even when I go through so much to bring you my love!
Very nice. I'm sure whatever moronic henchman you have skulking in the shadows is dying to kiss your feet after that show of wit, ~name~.
At least I'm still here to put on an actual show.
I hate your injustice. I hate it so much!
It shouldn't have played out like this...
Ohh, why can't I do anything anymore? I'd have ~name~ finished in less than 10 seconds if this place would just let me at her!
Anguish--- No, that's a bit too strong for just this... Writhe in loss for your misdeeds!
Skipping smoothly along!
I'm guessing you don't care much for your ~clothing~, right? I share that sentiment!
Aren't villains supposed to like dressing skimpily? So why did you come here covered in stuff like your ~clothing~?
Piece by piece, ~name~!
Really? Hmph!
This isn't how the game is supposed to go! I demand you take something larger off, right now!
Stop smirking at me! I know you're enjoying this, seeing me forced to restrain myself from attacking while you just stand there, laughing...
I prefer pink, but I'm not opposed to wearing red when the situation calls for it.
Come on! The faster we start, the sooner you can lose again!
Only by burning away wickedness can anyone be born anew!
~clothing.ifPlural(Do|Does)~ your ~clothing~ make you stronger? My clothes may be enchanted, but all that power still comes from the heart!
Minions go first! The villain can come later!
That's a smart choice, ~name~; smarter than a lot of other villains I've defeated at least.
Begone, foul ~clothing~~!
~name~ isn't just taking off ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ ~clothing~, he's building emotion!
I'm sure you don't need ~clothing.ifPlural(|that)~ ~clothing~ anymore!
Banished by the passion of love~!
The big things will wait till later. We can even deal with them together!
Sigh... Why even bother if I'm not bringing someone else into the love?
Really? We've come so far for only your ~clothing~?... Why not something bigger?
Too slow... This should have happened before I got naked.
Regular hero work seems a lot more appealing than ~name~ right now.
Finally decided to try and catch up? I'd have been less flexible if I knew you'd play this slow.
Aww, don't be a coward ~name~! What's life without risk?
Oh! Just your ~clothing~, huh?
Don't you think you could afford to be a little adventurous, ~name~?
What's wrong ~name~? Don't you want to join me?
