I'm not quite convinced... Are you certain you simply don't ruler over a really big lake, or river? Nothing wrong with giving up a false pretense of divinity!

Oh, good! Most manner of mania or obsession I've come across before manifests through evil means and consequence, so I just wanted to check! I will admit, the thrill of uncertainty is captivating, though...

Oh! So you actually just enjoy chance a ton? Great! Most civilians holding obsessions usually gained it through a manner of evil, so I thought it prudent to check! And I must admit, I have been enjoying the risk of this game quite a bit...
...Maybe it's because I keep finding them in such populated places, they're exposed to stronger evi- A ghost! Aha, I knew it!

...I wonder if it might be that their fasting makes them delirious, so they lack their judgment! Aha, the greatest magical girl of all time discovers the answer again!... Wait no, there's a ghost behind her now!
Huh? You have fake hair?... That's a thing? And it's not just a cleverly disguised head parasite?
Wait, but what about the top of your head? If you take your hair off, your skin might come with it!... What's a wig?
He's using his mustache to pull in---!... I think that's a minion?
Aha! I knew I was right in coming here to seek creatures of evil!
Aha! Evil finally reveals itself just as I thought it would when I arrived!
Oh calm down, it's just magic fire! Unless you're worried about revealing your identity, for some reason.
Just two losses for you to de-transform? Jeez, Ladybug. Don't you know magical girls are supposed to give everything their all?
Aha, I've pushed Caulifla into revealing her true form! And it's---!... Umm...
...Hologram? I've never heard of that before... Hey, sirens have weird voices, too. Are holograms a kind of monster? Maybe I should poke you a few times with magic just to be sure...
Oh, right. Apparently I'm not allowed to beam those I deem deserving until the game is over... Hmph! I guess Chara's punishment can wait till then.
...Right, I was told to wait until the game's end before I can blast anyone. Booo... Fine, I can wait till then, but not a moment past it!
Ha! She's even injuring herself! Maybe I won't even have to wait till after the game to end your cruel existence, demon!
Huh? Chara's slashing at herself? That's dumb... And here I thought the game was supposed to help you delay your inevitable demise by my righteous hands!
Wha-! Hey, that's no fair! Even after you dare claim yourself to be a noble demon!
Magic at last? And you're using it to-... Hold on a second!Hey! That's cheating, you underhanded temptress! Rectify your injustice this instant!
Hmph... I'd not expect a demon to follow my enchanting example or the rules, but this mockery of my bodice's loss is still uncalled for!
Even after I showed everyone how to use magic to strip, you still did this, Shamiko?! Hmph! How insulting!
What, you can't bear to look at our faces anymore?
But... Don't you need those to look at stuff? How are you going to struggle if you can't even see your cards!
You can't see without those, can you? Here, how about l take a peek at your hands and read them aloud for you, ~name~!... What do you mean, "that's cheating"? It's helping!
So shiny... King would love if someone got her ~clothing.ifPlural(some|one)~ of those!
Fancy! What trials did you take on to get a treasure like that?
I don't remember the last time I saw jewelry as simple as yours, ~name~... Everything everyone wears at the facility is so random.
...Taking it off won't make your head bulge up, right? Because I've seen a trinket that does exactly that, and I prefer my fights to happen while my opponent isn't dead.
What a gaudy trinket; a waste of your worth, and my time.
Stupid shiny ~name~...
What does it matter if you're a boy rather than a girl, Okino? Evil is formless, and I don't think something mundane as your gender is going to discourage it.
Really? Interesting, Okino!... Not so much to me, though. I care more about the presence of evil than whatever gender you'd like to use for yourself.

state.text: Aww, just peeking and bumping? And I was so sure ~player~ was a villain!... Can I still blast ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ with just a little bit of magic, Nagatoro? Pleeease?

case.state: There are a lot of nasty sea monsters that should be destroyed... But what about all the nice fish? There's this cute orange striped one I'd hate to see go! And what about all the fish with those silly eyes?

...Or not? Wait, that unfinished business thing was just a prank? Hmph! No better than a trickster spirit. What if someone got into danger during the few seconds I didn't even realize I was using to help you?
Oh! Your head can come off!... Well, at least it doesn't explode! It's hard to save people if their parts are splattered everywhere.
So is it a key? A blade? Both? What kind of stuff does it unlock?
...I think it's gone now... Phew! Nobody step near Florina for a little while; she might have been infected, and I'd prefer if only one of you turned into a giant wasp monster.
...Her but with yellow hair... Is that it? Seriously?
H-huh? So... you aren't just a cute girl?! But I adored you while you were acting like that! You... you fraud!
What? You've been deceiving us all?! Me less so than others, mind you... But still! Why couldn't you just be cute! Hmph!
Behind you, Sayaka! Kill the thing before it ru---!... Too late, it flew off. Sigh, I could have blasted it to dust if you weren't standing in the way.
Well, you do seem harmless... I'm not done with you, though! Just a few more rounds, and I'll get to the truth of what you are, "Miku"!
So you aren't actually a giant spider under that suit... Hehe, that would be interesting, an inhuman beast superhero!
S-STOP IGNORING ME!
I-... I won't let my enemies get away with ignoring their opposition! Justice isn't something that can simply be brushed aside!

Now, what to do with this foul creature of death in such a way that won't make the people in charge here upset... Forcing them to lose at the game? Eh, it's not quite enough of a punishment, but it'll do!

And now the monster has presented itself, what should I do to punish it's unjust existence... Hmm, since you haven't done anything evil within my sight just yet, I'll settle for simply humiliating you at this game!

Well, personally I only like doing it sometimes, but... Hehe, you remind me of my older sister King. She used to make the craziest gambits, only to pull through by sheer chance! I think you'd like her a lot, Yumeko!
Risking everything all the time can be a bit unnerving for myself... but people like my older sister King certainly have no issue with it! I think you'd like her and her mad strategies, Yumeko!

state.text: Yeah, yeah, it's just a henchman... Well, if Bobobo's still hiding like a villain, he'll still fall like one!

case.state: ...Huh... I was hoping for something worse...

state.text: ...Well, you're lucky I'm trying something different this time, monster. Normally I'd blast you to ash with magic, but instead I'll pacify you with the purity of love and cards! Prepare yourself!

case.state: Well, at least you're not giving the game up entirely... Oh? What's that little familiar floating around you?
What manner of monster gave you those, ~name~? If you can tell me, I wouldn't mind returning them the favor...
At least you came away from whatever gave you those alive! Many a monster I've faced seem keen of inflicting a lot more than reminders of their cruelty.
If only a hero had found your wound sooner... Eh; at the very least, you can think of it as a reminder of your life's triumph over death!
What a sloppy job... Red might rip her targets to shreds, but at least they're vanquished when she leaves.
Who or what left those? They should've been more thorough!
A story of victories and losses, etched in flesh... But I'm afraid that tale ends today, ~name~!
Gasp! You can strip with magic too?! Magical girls and magical swords aren't that different, it seems!
Hey, {b}HEY!{!reset} Don't run you coward! I wasn't through with you yet!... Oh? What's this they dropped?

state.text: Wait, they're actually gone! Aha! I knew you weren't faking it!
Huh? Hold on, you actually made your underwear disappear! Aha! I just knew you were actually magic!

case.state: It's back! Kill the creature, or get out of the wa---! No! The thing escaped us again!
Sigh. I guess I'll track it down after the game, if it hasn't fled the area already. You look great, by the way. Very alert.
{b}She's summoning a pillar! Duck!...{!reset} Oh... It's just to sit on. Phew...
Even now you're keeping your weapon? Hmph... I guess you're smarter than I gave credit for, demon.
...It's a smart choice to stay armed, demon. Not exactly one I like, however.
~Name~ doesn't get to play with us anymore..?
No chances left, ~name~. I wish you had more...
At least you were here, however insignificant your presence was.
You have to do that now? Already?
And now to finish you off!
This was always my favorite part... Prosecution!
Aww, but you were already so handsome! I wish I could savor that beauty just a little longer...
Kneel before the warmth of love!
Do we finally get to see ~name~---! Ooh! Yes!
Stripping, luck, conflict... It was all worth it to reach ~name~'s finale!
Come on, ~name~, we all want to see you!
I get to see ~name~ make love to himself... Haaa...
Well ~name~... Is your weapon ready?
Not so confident now, are you ~name~? You forgot one thing, no one escapes justice!
Finally! I was about to start begging you to join me! Imagine that, a hero pleading with a villain!
Now ~name~ gets to come to the love!
Haha! Now for your just rewa--- punishment!
~Name~, ~name~... Did you forget? Evil never wins!
Yes yes yes yes! At last, you're done for, ~name~!
I've had my eye on you especially, ~name~, that incredible will and confidence to push forward... But that all ends now!
A villain can fall, but something else always rises.
Just like that? No final monologue or dramatic explosion?
I've beaten you. and now you have to beat yourself. Such a proliferating forfeit.
This would be nicer on a paper. At least drawings don't run off without you.
Next time against someone so obviously above your power, rely on something other than luck!
You've got your own monster to deal with now.
Have fun, ~name~! Think righteous thoughts!
If I threw a few hands, I could get closer to ~name~... No, absolutely not! What kind of hero loses on purpose!
Huh? Oh, right; The game.
Time to start stroking your---!... Uh... Staff of love!
I guess there's something more important right now than suppressing the rest of you.
You're fine with me watching, aren't you? Why else would you be here?
Feel free to look over at me, it's only fair to share the sight of one another!
Balance at last!... Well, balance with ~name~ at least.
Now repent for all your sins and all our desires!
Fight till and past the climax, ~name~!
You had your chance, and like a true villain you squandered it. Ha!
Get to it, and no hiding, either! You've evaded me far too long to show me nothing!
Enjoy it! You were only brought this pleasure because of me, after all!
In the name of Love and Justice, I condemn ~name~ to his final judgment!
Yes, yes; We can all hear how much fun you're having, ~name~.
...Hmmph!
Good thing you can make yourself happy...
No point dwelling on ~name~ , he's already finishing himself off.
You're getting too noisy. Hurry up and end this.
Strengths and weaknesses, I suppose...
Oh just get it over with already!
How does your hand move so smoothly? Wouldn't you just be pulling your skin?
Actually seeing it pulse... This is a lot different than looking at pictures.
Self doubt is never a good thing! Instead of being worried, you should focus on what's being done now instead!
Smite your lust! Strike and pull at the beast!
Of course you're having fun. I would never let anyone suffer, evil or not!
Don't mind me, I'm just... committing this to memory.
W-well, it would be rude of me to ignore your personal affections.
I could practice that motion with my staff... Just in case.
Could I even grip that correctly?
Thanks for giving my body a purpose...
Knight would scream if she found me watching this.
There's no rush... Just keep going forever and ever.
Seeing this in person... Well, it's a lot better than what I had in mind.
Stroke yourself in the name of love!
D-doing it together...
I can't believe I'm doing this with my opponent, of all people.
Peace for everyone! Isn't it great, ~name~?
Seeing you stroke it makes me want to--- Ohhh...
Hah... I'm not giving up till you do, ~name~!
Hmm... Maybe I'll help if you tell us all how sorry you are.
Without cards to focus on, I can spare all my attention for ~name~!... Although, I do miss the excitement of thrashing you all at cards.
I bet I could purify you in half the time if I was allowed! Though, I guess a high energy bolt of love magic to the chest wouldn't be quite as arousing.
Put some more effort into it! You'll never redeem yourself like that!
Heroes always have to stay vigilant... We wouldn't want want to lose sight of what we're fighting, would we?
See? Now we're getting somewhere, ehe!
~Name~ is going to finish soon...
Might as well wrap up, you've only one thing left hidden.
Hey wait, why'd you make that noi--- oh, you're almost done.
How are you rubbing it so fast?! Is this your full potential?
It's still getting bigger? How long could you possibly keep doing it?
Fight on for just a little longer!
Go down swinging, ~name~! Or in this case, stroking!
It feels like forever since ~name~ began! I think he can feel all that buildup as well.
It's unbearable to hear you sounding so desperate! Is there any way to help?
You must be yearning to finish... No harm dragging it out further, though!
Go ahead, ~name~, purge your penis of all its wickedness!
Why think when I can just enjoy watching ~name~? All the moaning is making that harder anyways.
So fast! That means you're almost done, right?
You've lasted long enough... But why not keep going for a little while?
Don't surrender at the very end, ~name~! See your journey through into its conclusion!
Aww, but couldn't you do it just a little while longer?
But why can't our bliss last forever?
Ha... Ha... Even if you are, I won't be giving in just yet!
D-don't cum yet! I'm not close enough!
~Name~? ~Name~!... I think it's too late to get him to slow down.
Just let alllll the bad thoughts and plans melt away...
Now it's time for your head to burst! Both of them!
Justice doesn't settle for anything less than total judgment! Let every last bit of evil pour out of you!
People always need a hero to reach the end of their journeys... Do you need me?
Maybe just a graze against you wouldn't be too lenient...
Expungement or excision? Whatever the case, it's outside of you now.
You didn't even need me here to finish, did you!
And now the star falls away forever unto the horizon.
You got what you came here for... I can't say the same.
Your purpose is fulfilled. Now, it's time to fade from our focus.
S-so much came out...
If only you could go again, we'd all continue to watch your love.
That final blow, the closing moments... It's truly an amazing ending, isn't it?
It looks like white sap... I wonder if it shares the taste?
So that goop would normally go... Inside someone?
Aww, why did ~name~ have to finish already...
The climax of your fight! {small}And of my emotions...{!reset}
...Eh, even with you finished, we're still close enough.
W-what a climax!
I-it's so sticky, and hot..!
Love goo... If I wasn't familiar with the deadly kind, I'd probably touch it!
And stay down!
Redemption is at hand!... And on your hand too, I suppose.
Look at how much vile goop you released... I doubt the good in you'd have lasted another week if I hadn't came!
Another villain cleansed of evil! For all my hard work, I deserve a pat on the back!... Not from you though, ~name~. At least, not till you wash your hands.
No more weaseling away, it's time for your proper forfeit!
Degeneracy may have dragged you this far, but now comes the moment for passion to overpower you!
Bye ~name~, it was fun while you lasted.
Peace restored to yet another foe...
Sure, go pleasure yourself. It's not like someone else wanted to engage with the game.
How evil of you, to deprive me of purpose! If I wasn't so righteous, I'd think you were a villain!
Seeing yourself to the end... There's pride in that! For the side of good, surrender is never an option!
And the hero reigns supreme! Banish yourself into shame, villain!
How exciting for ~name~, and for us!
Love triumphs! Now, bask in its warmth, ~name~!
It's happening, isn't it! The time for ~name~ to give us a show!
I'm still winning! We all are with this forfeit!
Cease your struggling, foul being! Justice is at hand!
I've been waiting forever for this!
How could you say no to the fast and furious swan boat of love?
Now we can match ~name~!... Well, sort of. I'm still better than you.
Ehe! Feeling ready, ~name~? You have had all game, and my help!
It doesn't matter if I can't get cards; You won't escape justice, ~name~!
No excuses, ~name~! If I had to do it, so do you!
Following in my footsteps, are you? Don't be embarrassed, it's normal to want the incomparable glory of a true hero!
Haha! Retribution!
The first good step to loss is acceptance. Don't you want to be good for us all, ~name~?
Well? Get to it! Not like there's anywhere left for you to go but to love.
Now, who's next?
I'd prefer to just judge them directly, here and now... But I can spare ~name~ that so we can try this new way out a little.
Why is ~name~ starting their forfeit so early? Soon I'll have nothing to do...
Hmph!
Truly your just reward.
I hope you're at least strong enough to make yourself feel something.
Turn yourself just a liiiiitle bit this way and... Perfect! Get going, ~name~!
You chose to come here, ~name~! And you wouldn't want to break the rules, now, wouldn't you?
Do you feel shame? Excitement? Something in-between?
Not quite there yet... This game is still missing something.
Balance at last...
Now banish yourself to shame, clever enchantress!
Hmmm... I guess I could use a sidekick!
J-just get down here already!
If only I could help cleanse you more...
Well? Get to it!
Don't you dare hide, ~name~! We earned this!
Oh? Starting so fast?... I must have been missing out on something amazing.
Like always, the hero's still one step ahead!
Get to it! And don't even bother try showing up my performance; you wouldn't have the flair, or passion!
Face my vengeance from beyond modesty!
Just don't hurt yourself, got it? There's still a lot of "good" left on you I don't want damaged.
You're having your fun, but I'm not really having mine.
Just keep going, I guess...
You seem very comfortable with this, ~name~... That can't be, right? Who would practice losing?
The humiliation of failure... I suppose ~name~ could find pleasure in that.
What of my own pleasure? My own enjoyment!
How shameful of you, selfishly indulging yourself in such a debased manner.
What's ~name~ feeling right now? Hopefully I can learn it...
Let the flames of love burn bright! Can you feel its heat?
Sigh... It's not fair, why can't I focus on both ~name~ and the game at once!
So vulnerable... But I won't let anything bad happen to you!
Love truly reaches into our deepest depths, doesn't it!
W-wow, you're certainly bursting with passion!
Have to keep watching... For your safety of course!
This is normal, ~name~! Intimacy is meant to be shared! What difference does setting make?
Take your time... Some things are meant to be savored.
Are you staring at me?... Well, it only makes sense you'd want to look upon the avatar of love in your moment of passion!
Mmmh! This forfeit lets me relish in my victories for even longer! I wonder why it isn't common?
If it comes down to it, I could probably copy her...
It's not like I'd be losing, right? After all, this is what the game's about!
Building higher and higher, unable to stop till the final movements!
Maybe I'll be joining ~name~ soon... That doesn't sound so bad!
Thinking back to all my crusades of love... Nothing can come even close to the kind of passion this game creates...
It's still a bit unbelievable I'd never known about this kind of love. Oh well, experience is still the greatest teacher!
Pipe down a little, ~name~. I'm trying to focus!... Ohh!
Let's see who can hold out longest...
This is magical, the two of us pleasuring ourselves together...
Hehe...
Y-you're very pretty, ~name~...
I'll never forget about doing this... or doing it with you, ~name~.
Hmm, maybe there's still some good in you yet...

The way everyone else is looking at ~name~... They don't plan on eating her, right?! No, only that big bad wolf does that. I'm sure the others are just enchanted by the performance!... Wait, that could be evil too!
After all this is through, I hope you can finally see the true light of love, ~name~!
I was more enthralling, right everyone? I already know the answer, don't bother speaking up.
I could help... But then I don't think ~name~ will have learned her lesson.
Just do what I did!... Well, get as close as you can to what I did. Stuff varies from person to person, and it's not like you're me, likely much to your disappointment.
Shouldn't you get more tired the longer you go?
S-slow down! Aren't you worried about hurting yourself?
It's getting a lot harder to ignore what you're doing, ~name~... That doesn't make it any more appealing.
Do you feel shameful? It certainly doesn't look that way.
~Name~ seems very determined not to slide into obscurity.
Are you winning in the battle for pleasure? It sounds like it!
Seems this resistance can't hold any longer...
What if you just kept masturbating forever? We'd both never get tired of it, right?
You can do it! Go even faster!
There's bliss existing with a clear goal in mind... But now it's time to finish.
Aww... Why do love and justice always have to be so short lived?
There's bliss existing with a clear goal in mind... But now it's time to finish.
It won't be long now...
Pulse with your heart, follow it to paradise!
Let love course through your entire being!
Is ~name~ really that close? Aww, I wanted to finish together.
D-deliver yourself to love at long last!
I'm glad I could be of help till the end, ~name~!
But how! I-I can hardly keep up with you!
T-till the very end, ~name~!
So beastly... Well, the less civilized villains always did fight the hardest.
Melt into your own loving embrace~...
Best not to disturb her... At least, not if you aren't qualified! HEY! WE BELIEVE IN YOU, ~NAME~!
There's no shame in a little begging, if you're so desperate.
~Name~ seems like she finally has a good handle on herself... Still, I think a little help wouldn't throw her off.
Moving onwards...
No chances for redemption, just the silent obscurity of a bystander...
Quick to fall, quick to finish...
I'll remember this performance, though with more envy than fondness.
Done so soon? Aww, I was enjoying the show...
Didn't that feel great? Evil could never taste such rich love without my help!
Gah! What made that sound, I was busy looking at my--- Oh, ~name~ finished!
No finishing flair? But you could look even better all sparkly!
All good things must come to an end. Sigh, I wish these battles could last forever.
Mmm... I feel tired just looking at you, ~name~. But justice can never rest!
Did you just... twitch? That performance must have really resonated throughout you!
It's not a particularly romantic finale, but love takes many forms!
T-thank you for your service...
I'll be joining your pleasure soon!
Oooh!
Have you finally accepted the warm embrace of love?
Aaaaand, you're done! Now go forth and live in the name of love~!
You look exhausted, ~name~! Hmm, I think that spot on the ~background.surface~ hasn't been tainted yet, go rest a moment.
And at last, peace returns to ~name~. Ahhh, I love my job!
What a spectacular finale from ~name~! Good enough to enjoy, though not thrilling enough to compare!
I---... Huh? I have to forfeit first?! It wasn't supposed to go like this, heroes are meant to go last!
M-me!? First?! Why not someone else, justice knows they'd deserve it!
Hey, I didn't lose! I've just temporarily stopped winning.
Hey! I'll have you know, Mia, that this isn't losing, since good never fails! It's just... not winning right now. But it will in a bit!
No! This... this can't happen! Justice can't be beaten back, much less this soon! I'll... I'll find whoever did this and make them pay!
What the---! Hey! It's supposed to be the villains who have to forfeit, not me! The villains!
V-vile villains!... I'll get every last one of you for this! Evil hasn't and won't ever win! It can't!
Fwoo... Okay! This is what I've been preparing for!
Oh, now me? I would have enjoyed waiting just a bit longer...
Boo... Couldn't I stay with you all balanced here nude forever?
Hmph! Well then you're standing wrong. I'll lecture you on the specifics of heroic victories later, though. For now...
Well. I can assure you I know better than you what victory and loss actually are. Mia! Though, an explanation of that will have to wait till after this...
Hmph! Well then you're sitting wrong. I'll lecture you on the specifics of heroic victories later, though. For now...
No, what you've done is lose, not me! I'd think I would know better if I'd failed or succeeded, not you! That will have to be explained after I finish this, however...
Fine! But to spite you all, I'll make sure I enjoy it! That'll show you harbingers of misery!
Well, I might as well enjoy this!... Not like I have much reason not to.
Just another battle, but one I can fight alone... That sounds nice...
I'll not shy away! In the name of love~!
S-stop laughing at me!
When was the last time I did this? Actually, have I done this?
The air, my hand, my heart... Aahh, everything's just so warm!
This feels a bit selfish... At least everyone else gets their own turn.
Balance is... Ooohh... hard to keep like this...
Mmm...
Not quite as thrilling as victory but--- Ahh! It's getting there!
Oohh, yes~...
I'll never... back down!
This would be a lot better if I had more fingers...
A-almost there!
L-losing balance!
Aah! Just a bit more!
W-watch me---! Please don't look away!
Justice is c-coming!
{big}F-for looooove~!!{!reset}
Huff... Huff... That felt... really good...
Did I lose? Everyone keeps acting like I did... No, no it's all of you who are wrong.
{big}Heeeey! Staaaafff! Come baaaaaack!...{!reset} That's not good, I've no clue where it is, and it's not returning either.
Could I have some cards? Not to play anymore, though! Just to flick into all your gaping faces.
At first I thought it was just a waste of time, but this kind of love is actually kind of nice.
...What's an anti-hero supposed to be? It sounds like the opposite of a hero, but why not just call it a villain then?
Yawn... Mmm, maybe I can afford a quick nap before going back home...
I could've been doing that instead of sitting in the cold rain for villains who'd never come... I could've done that while waiting in the cold rain for villains who would never come!
Hehe... Knight's going to love hearing about all this! I can't wait to see her ecstatic face once I tell her about the game!

The agents must be worried about where I am right now... Eh, they'll be fine without me for a little longer! I propped King's door open so she could get out to fight evil whenever she decides to wake up!
H-hey! All of you stop pretending I'm a loser! I can see how you all look at me, even if you try to hide it!
... I expected to win, but... Maybe I shouldn't have even bothered coming.
...Nobody needs me here anymore...
...I won the the game? Oh... Yaaaaaay...
...Err, would anyone happen to know where I came in from? I can't seem to remember how I got ~background.location~ here...

Yet again, the magical girl of love triumphs over villainy! And with the power of love and justice combined, never again sha---! H-hey! Where's everybody going? Don't leave yet, I wasn't done with my speech!
You're all just going to leave? Hmmph! No thanks for your savior, I see!
What can I say, victory just comes naturally for the greatest magical girl to ever grace the world's heart~.
Was there every any doubt? Not from me, and certainly never again from all of you!
Aww, don't look so ashamed everyone! I'm sure whenever you play your next game together, you'll all be failures instead of embarrassments!
Poor ~name~, still so full of corruption... Say, if you want, I could... finish you off. How's that sound, ~name~?
Oh well... Usually if it's only one survivor they don't come back to bite you.
Don't think I'll forget this humiliation so easily! One day soon, I'll come back to bring you your righteous reward, you, you---!... What was your name again?
